channel.title: [PI] cat help
channel.description: i added cats into my server and they work perfectly but...whenever they're on the floor..they start attacking you..and if you say just look in the aggressive method i already did..theyre unlisted..so there has to be something other than this that allows them to attack me...would anyone care to help? will rep if i get it working

hit points are 0…ill look into the second one tho

item.title: [PI] cat help
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Maybe try taking away their Hit points. Either that or you might of added something wrong. Try looking through what you have added and see if you have placed it into an NPC attacking method anywhere.

Read full topic
